EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Inquisitive: Inquisitive
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to Attack with all weapons. +1 to Diplomacy, Intimidate and Bluff

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Inquisitive: Hit the Streets
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
You gain an additional copy of Diplomacy on a separate cooldown timer. This timer is shared with Half-Elven Social Grace's Diplomacy. Diplomacy allows you to attempt to encourage enemies to find targets other than yourself.
Passive: +2% Dodge, +3 Diplomacy skill, +5% Doubleshot. If you are a Half-Elf, this Diplomacy bonus is instead +10. Cooldown: 1 Minute

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Inquisitive: Mind Like Iron
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +3 to Will Saving Throws. You no longer automatically fail Saving Throws for Fear, Enchantment or Illusion effects on a Natural 1. You will automatically perform a Search check to locate traps and secret doors when you are in range to Spot them, although this Search check operates at a -4 penalty.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Inquisitive: True Seeing
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You permanently gain the effects of the True Seeing spell. You gain +1 Competence Bonus to Critical Threat Range and Multiplier with Light and Heavy (non-repeating) Crossbows. Gain +1 Imbue Dice.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Inquisitive: Undaunted
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +5 Ranged Power, +3 to all Saving Throws, +4 to the Max Dex Bonus of equipped armor. You gain the Slippery Mind feat (you can wriggle free from magical effects that would otherwise control or compel you. You gain a second saving throw versus enchantments). Gain +1 Imbue Dice.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Inquisitive: Master Inquisitive
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +2 to all Ability Scores. +10 Ranged Power. While wielding a Light or Heavy (non-repeating) Crossbow, your Vorpal hits will knock down targets hit on a natural 20 + confirmation for 6 seconds without a saving throw, as a Great Crossbow. Gain +1 Imbue Dice.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Inquisitive: Dual Shooter
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While you have a Light or Heavy (non-repeating) Crossbow equipped, you instead fight with a Hand Crossbow in each hand, with each mimicking the damage and effects of your equipped Crossbow. +1 to Attack and Damage with Light and Heavy (non-repeating) crossbows.(also works with runearm)

Stance.Name: Dual Shooter
Stance.Description: While you have a Light or Heavy (non-repeating) Crossbow equipped, you instead fight with a Hand Crossbow in each hand, with each mimicking the damage and effects of your equipped Crossbow. +1 to Attack and Damage with Light and Heavy (non-repeating) crossbows.(also works with runearm)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Inquisitive: Eye for Accuracy
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] to Attack with weapons.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Inquisitive: Conjure Bolts
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Conjures a stack of 1000 bolts for use with a crossbow. These bolts have a +1 enhancement bonus. These bolts dissolve into nothingness after logout. Spell Point Cost: [30/20/10]

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Inquisitive: Law on your side
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Imbue Toggle: Your Light and Heavy (non-repeating) Crossbow attacks deal 1d10 Law damage per Imbue Dice on hit to Chaotic creatures and 1d6 Law damage on hit to all other creatures, scaling with 200% Ranged Power.

Stance.Name: Law on your side
Stance.Description: Imbue Toggle: Your Light and Heavy (non-repeating) Crossbow attacks deal 1d10 Law damage per Imbue Dice on hit to Chaotic creatures and 1d6 Law damage on hit to all other creatures, scaling with 200% Ranged Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Inquisitive: Inquisitive Skills
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] to Diplomacy, Intimidate and Bluff. Rank 3: +1 to Will Saving Throws.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Inquisitive: Crossbow Adept I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to Attack and +2 to Damage with Light and Heavy (non-repeating) Crossbows.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Inquisitive: Wand and Scroll Mastery
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[25/50/75]% damage and healing of your wands, scrolls and other items that cast spells. Adds +[1/3/6] to the save DC's of your offensive wands. Taking Wand and Scroll Mastery in one enhancement tree will block its availability in other enhancement trees.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Inquisitive: Observation
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When you use Diplomacy on an enemy, you gain one stack of Observation (+2 to Armor Class, +2 to PRR, +2 to MRR). Each stack lasts 20 seconds before being removed. This stacks up to 5 times.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Inquisitive: Improved Law
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 Imbue Dice.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Inquisitive: Action Boost: Skills
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Active to gain a +[2/4/6] Action Boost bonus to all skills for 20 seconds. Cooldown: 30 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Inquisitive: Crossbow Adept II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to Attack and Damage with Light and Heavy (non-repeating) Crossbows.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Inquisitive: First Things First
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Pick a skill that you'd use to enter a room.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Ask Questions First
EnhancementSelection.Description: Active this skill to gain +20 to Diplomacy and a 10% reduction in the cooldown time of Social Skills for 60 seconds. When you use Diplomacy on an enemy while this is active, you gain a stack of Preparation (+2% Dodge that ignores Dodge Cap). Each stack of Preparation lasts 12 seconds, and acquiring a new stack rests the duration. Preparation can stack up to 5 times. Cooldown: 2 Minutes

EnhancementSelection.Name: Shoot First
EnhancementSelection.Description: Deals: +40% Damage Shoot First: Bow or Crossbow Attack: On successful damage, this causes your opponent to take "Shot Wound". (Cooldown: 6 seconds) Note: Shot Wound deals 1d6 damage per Character Level every 2 seconds for 12 seconds. This damage scales with 200% Ranged Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Inquisitive: Improved Observation
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Each stack of Observation now also grants you 5% Fortification bypass.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Inquisitive: Stop in the Name
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Active: Targeted enemy must save (DC Diplomacy + d20 vs. Will) or be Dazed for 10 seconds. Daze is removed on hit. Bosses are immune to Daze. Cooldown: 18 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Inquisitive: Ability Score I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose an Ability Score.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Inquisitive: Crossbow Adept III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to Attack and +2 to Damage with Light and Heavy (non-repeating) Crossbows.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Inquisitive: What Later?
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Take a follow up skill to handle the situation.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Ask Questions Later
EnhancementSelection.Description: Requires Shoot First. When you use Diplomacy on enemies who have at least one stack of Shot Wound, they take a Crushing Despair effect for 30 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Shoot Later
EnhancementSelection.Description: Deals: +60% Damage Bow or Crossbow Attack: This attack has +2 Critical Threat Range and Multiplier. Cooldown: 15 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Inquisitive: Inquisition Style
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: How do you interrogate?

EnhancementSelection.Name: Arcane Inquisition
EnhancementSelection.Description: You gain +15 Universal Spell Power while you have a Light or Heavy (non-repeating) Crossbow equipped.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Dashing Inquisition
EnhancementSelection.Description: You can Swashbuckle while wielding a Light (non-repeating) Crossbow.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Divine Inquisition
EnhancementSelection.Description: You count Light and Heavy (non-repeating) Crossbows as Favored Weapons, regardless of your Deity.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Martial Inquisition
EnhancementSelection.Description: +5% Doubleshot with Light and Heavy (non-repeating) Crossbows.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Inquisitive: Greater Law
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 bonus Imbue Dice.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Inquisitive: Ability Score II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose an Ability Score.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Inquisitive: No Holds Barred
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Action Boost: You may activate this ability to enchant your crossbow to instantly reload itself for 18 seconds. You must have a crossbow equipped to use this skill. This shares charges and a cooldown with Endless Fusilade. If you also have Endless Fusilade, you gain +10 Ranged Power while No Holds Barred is active. Passive: +5 Ranged Power, +10% Doubleshot. Cooldown: 30 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Inquisitive: Arresting Assault
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate Ability: All nearby enemies take -10 Melee, Ranged, and Spell Power for 20 seconds and 5 stacks of Vulnerability. In addition, nearby enemies must save (DC Diplomacy + d20 vs. Will) or be subjected to a 10-second Daze. (Bosses are immune to Daze, but not the Power reduction or Vulnerability). Daze is removed on hit. Cooldown: 1 minute

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Inquisitive: Improved Uncanny Dodge
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate this ability to gain a temporary 50% Dodge bonus and a +6 Reflex save bonus. This feat also grants you a 1% passive bonus to Dodge at levels 4, 6, 8, 12, 16 and 20. This shares a cooldown with the Improved Uncanny Dodge feat.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Inquisitive: Inquisitor's Path
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Which path will you follow?

EnhancementSelection.Name: Jaded
EnhancementSelection.Description: Gain +5 Ranged Power, +15% Attack Speed and +15% Doubleshot with non-Repeating, non-Great Crossbows. +1 bonus Imbue Dice. Damage from Law on your Side is now 1d10 Law damage and now applies to all creatures.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Optimistic
EnhancementSelection.Description: Gain +5 Ranged Power, +15% Attack Speed and +15% Doubleshot with non-Repeating, non-Great Crossbows. +2 bonus Imbue Dice.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Vigilante
EnhancementSelection.Description: Gain +5 Ranged Power, +15% Attack Speed and +15% Doubleshot with non-Repeating, non-Great Crossbows. +1 bonus Imbue Dice. Damage from Law on your Side is now 1d10 Chaos damage and now applies to all creatures.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Inquisitive: Diplomatic Immunity
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Toggle: While active, your attacks with Light and Heavy (non-repeating) Crossbows have a chance to automatically trigger Diplomacy around you.
